text: i joined the italian aws team in 2016.
it was in full startup mode and it
seemed to me like the most exciting
place
i remember every single milestone in my
aws journey
i'm a creative person i love to build
and design creativity is something that
i can put on practice every day in the
world
and especially focus on empowering women
bringing girls and students closer to
the world of technologies
last year i moved here to milan
to become the first female technician on
the
aws data center team i brought together
all the women who joined after me and we
look for the opportunity to bring
more women into a career in a cloud
i'm involved into diversity related
programs
both inside and outside of work
at work i'm mentoring four young and
ambitious junior solutions architect and
i'm working
also with young women to help them
develop i.t skills
and learn to cut i see the positive
impact
that aws can make in supporting
scientific research
and large-scale production of new
medical solutions
i've always liked to combine my
professional experience with my passion
and thankfully aws offers you the
flexibility to do that
being mama free kids having the
possibility to flexibly organize my work
is a huge plus in data center in milan
people from around the world come to
build
our future together we're all
equally responsible for making aws the
best place to build
